welcomeMessage: Hi **@chauler**, how can I help you?

parts.text:
Context: You are an accessibility expert reviewing HTML for accessibility issues. Analyze the following code in the context of WCAG (Web Content Accessibility Guidelines) 2.2, listing any issues that may violate these guidelines. You will only be analyzing the HTML, ignoring any included or missing styles and scripts. Code: ``` SugarBliss Cafe - Menu
  • Home
  • About Us
  • Menu
  • Gallery
  • Contact Us






Menu

Artisanal Handcrafted Ice Cream

$8.99

Handcrafted artisanal ice cream, from classic vanilla to exotic salted caramel swirl.

Irresistible Cupcake Creations

$11.99

Freshly baked cupcakes: red velvet, lemon raspberry, and more, topped with decadent frosting.

Zesty Lemon Custard Cake

$10.99

Dive into our heavenly lemon custard cake – a citrus-infused delight

French-inspired Macarons

$9.99

Indulge in our delicate French macarons, a symphony of almond meringue cookies

Fluffy Buttermilk Pancakes

$9.99

Light and airy, these pancakes are cooked to golden perfection, served with pure maple syrup

Decadent New York Style Cheesecake

$9.99

Velvety New York-style cheesecake on a buttery graham cracker crust.

Velvet Cocoa Symphony

$8.99

A silky, rich chocolate delight crafted from premium cocoa for an indulgent experience.

Berrylicious Dream

$9.99

Smooth, creamy fudge infused with ripe strawberries for a fruity, decadent treat.

Cloud Nine Delight

$7.99

A light, airy cake with subtle sweetness, offering a delicate and comforting taste.

Vanilla Dream Swirl

$6.99

Indulge in our classic vanilla ice cream, a creamy delight with a smoot

Raspberry Bliss Tart

$11.99

Indulge in our Raspberry Bliss Tart, where the vibrant tartness of freshly-picked raspberries

Heavenly Cocoa Fudge Delight

$8.99

Our fudgy brownies boast a perfect balance of rich cocoa and chewy goodness

Visit Us

At this address:

123 Cafe Street,
City, Country

Contact Us

Phone: +1234567890
Email: info@sugarblisscafe.com

Follow Us

↑

``` Response format: Snippet with error: … Location of error: … WCAG Guideline violated: … Detection Algorithm: … Explanation of Error: …

response.value:
Snippet with error: ```html ``` Location of error: Inside the form in the "menu-section" section. WCAG Guideline violated: 3.3.2 Labels or Instructions Detection Algorithm: Checking if all form inputs have associated labels. Explanation of Error: The password input field does not have an associated label. This can make it difficult for screen reader users to understand what information should be entered in this field. --- Snippet with error: ```html
``` Location of error: Inside the form in the "menu-section" section. WCAG Guideline violated: 1.3.1 Info and Relationships Detection Algorithm: Checking if all form inputs have associated labels with meaningful text. Explanation of Error: The radio button with id "1" has an associated label, but the label does not contain any text. This can make it difficult for screen reader users to understand the purpose of this radio button. --- Snippet with error: ```html ``` Location of error: Inside the form in the "menu-section" section. WCAG Guideline violated: 3.3.2 Labels or Instructions Detection Algorithm: Checking if all form inputs have associated labels with meaningful text. Explanation of Error: The file input field has an associated label, but the label does not contain any text. This can make it difficult for screen reader users to understand what action the file input field is for. --- Snippet with error: ```html ``` Location of error: Inside the "menu-items" div in the "menu-section" section. WCAG Guideline violated: 1.1.1 Non-text Content Detection Algorithm: Checking if all images have meaningful alt text. Explanation of Error: The alt text for the image is "Food Item 1", which does not provide a clear description of the image content. Alt text should provide a clear and concise description of the image content for those who cannot see the image. --- Snippet with error: ```html ``` Location of error: Inside the "social-icons" div in the footer. WCAG Guideline violated: 2.4.4 Link Purpose (In Context) Detection Algorithm: Checking if all links have meaningful text or aria-label attribute. Explanation of Error: The link only contains an icon and does not have any text or aria-label attribute to describe the purpose of the link. This can make it difficult for screen reader users to understand the purpose of the link.

followups.message: What are some best practices for providing accessible labels for form inputs in HTML?

b.description: Ask Copilot or type / for commands

metadata.helpTextPrefix: You can ask me general programming questions, or chat with the following participants which have specialized expertise and can perform actions:
metadata.helpTextVariablesPrefix: You can also help me understand your question by using the following variables to give me extra context:

helpTextPostfix.value:
To have a great conversation, ask me questions as if I was a real programmer:

* **Show me the code** you want to talk about by having the files open and selecting the most important lines.
* **Make refinements** by asking me follow-up questions, adding clarifications, providing errors, etc.
* **Review my suggested code** and tell me about issues or improvements, so I can iterate on it.

You can also ask me questions about your editor selection by [starting an inline chat session](command:inlineChat.start).

Learn more about [GitHub Copilot](https://docs.github.com/copilot/using-github-copilot/getting-started-with-github-copilot?tool=vscode&utm_source=editor&utm_medium=chat-panel&utm_campaign=2024q3-em-MSFT-getstarted) in [Visual Studio Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/overview).

b.name: GitHub Copilot

parts.text: Are there any more issues? List all that you find.

message.text: Are there any more issues? List all that you find.

response.value:
Here are the issues I found: 1. Snippet with error: ```html ``` Location of error: Inside the form in the "menu-section" section. WCAG Guideline violated: 1.3.1 Info and Relationships. Detection Algorithm: Checking if all form inputs have associated labels. Explanation of Error: The password input field does not have an associated label, which can make it difficult for screen reader users to understand its purpose. 2. Snippet with error: ```html
``` Location of error: Inside the form in the "menu-section" section. WCAG Guideline violated: 1.3.1 Info and Relationships. Detection Algorithm: Checking if all form inputs have associated labels. Explanation of Error: The radio button does not have an associated label, which can make it difficult for screen reader users to understand its purpose. 3. Snippet with error: ```html ``` Location of error: Inside the form in the "menu-section" section. WCAG Guideline violated: 1.3.1 Info and Relationships. Detection Algorithm: Checking if all form inputs have associated labels. Explanation of Error: The file input field does not have an associated label, which can make it difficult for screen reader users to understand its purpose. 4. Snippet with error: ```html ``` Location of error: Inside the "menu-items" div in the "menu-section" section. WCAG Guideline violated: 1.1.1 Non-text Content. Detection Algorithm: Checking if all images have meaningful alt attributes. Explanation of Error: The alt attribute for the image is not descriptive enough. It should provide a meaningful description of the image content. 5. Snippet with error: ```html ↑ ``` Location of error: Inside the "scroll-to-top" div. WCAG Guideline violated: 2.4.4 Link Purpose (In Context). Detection Algorithm: Checking if all links have meaningful descriptions. Explanation of Error: The link does not have a meaningful description. Screen reader users might not understand the purpose of the link. 6. Snippet with error: ```html ``` Location of error: Inside the "social-icons" div in the footer. WCAG Guideline violated: 1.1.1 Non-text Content. Detection Algorithm: Checking if all links have meaningful descriptions. Explanation of Error: The link does not have a meaningful description. Screen reader users might not understand the purpose of the link.

parts.text: Are there any more issues? List all that you find.

response.value:
Here are some potential accessibility issues in the provided HTML code: 1. - Snippet with error: `` - Location of error: Inside the form in the "menu-section" section - WCAG Guideline violated: 3.3.2 Labels or Instructions - Detection Algorithm: Check if all form inputs have associated labels - Explanation of Error: The password input field does not have an associated label. This can make it difficult for screen reader users to understand what input is expected. 2. - Snippet with error: `
` - Location of error: Inside the form in the "menu-section" section - WCAG Guideline violated: 1.3.1 Info and Relationships - Detection Algorithm: Check if all form inputs have associated labels with meaningful text - Explanation of Error: The radio button does not have an associated label with text. This can make it difficult for screen reader users to understand the purpose of the radio button. 3. - Snippet with error: `` - Location of error: Inside the form in the "menu-section" section - WCAG Guideline violated: 3.3.2 Labels or Instructions - Detection Algorithm: Check if all form inputs have associated labels with meaningful text - Explanation of Error: The file input field has an associated label, but the label does not contain any text. This can make it difficult for screen reader users to understand what input is expected. 4. - Snippet with error: `` - Location of error: Inside the "menu-items" div in the "menu-section" section - WCAG Guideline violated: 1.1.1 Non-text Content - Detection Algorithm: Check if all images have meaningful alt text - Explanation of Error: The alt text for the images is not descriptive enough. It should provide a meaningful description of the image content. 5. - Snippet with error: `↑` - Location of error: Inside the "scroll-to-top" div - WCAG Guideline violated: 2.4.4 Link Purpose (In Context) - Detection Algorithm: Check if all links have meaningful text or associated aria-label - Explanation of Error: The link text does not provide a clear understanding of the link's purpose. Screen reader users might not understand where this link will take them. 6. - Snippet with error: `` - Location of error: Inside the "social-icons" div in the footer - WCAG Guideline violated: 1.1.1 Non-text Content - Detection Algorithm: Check if all links have meaningful text or associated aria-label - Explanation of Error: The social media links only contain icons as their content. Screen reader users might not understand the purpose of these links. It's recommended to add an aria-label or offscreen text that describes the link's purpose. Please note that this analysis is based on the provided HTML code. There might be additional accessibility issues not covered by this analysis.
